relevant_communication:
We have lobbied for a local Pollinator Policy.   
We are part of the Welsh Pollinator Initiative.
goals__remit: Bees for Development (BfD) is an international charity based in Monmouth, Wales, specialising in sustainable apiculture.  We promote simple, sustainable beekeeping – helping people in poor and remote areas of the world produce honey and beeswax, protect biodiversity, and keep bees healthy.  Most of our work is in developing countries, where since 1993 we have worked with, supported and listened to beekeepers to maintain and develop locally appropriate techniques for harvesting the products of bees while conserving local bee populations.  Healthy thriving bee populations allow people to harvest and market products that have value everywhere, improving livelihoods and reducing poverty.
